UsageGrantRenewalPolicy.name: UsageGrantRenewalPolicy
UsageGrantRenewalPolicy.description: Represents a policy about the rollover of a usage grant.

Code.description: A unique user-defined string for the usage grant renewal policy.

IsRenewalAllowed.description: Indicates whether the policy renewal is allowed (true) or not (false). If true, then the policy can be renewed.

LastReferencedDate.description: The date when this record was last referenced.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed a record related to this record.

Name.description: The name of the renewal policy record.

RenewalFrequency.description: The frequency of the policy renewals, when used with the RenewalFrequencyUnit field.

RenewalFrequencyUnit.description: The renewal duration for a policy.

Status.description: The status of the renewal policy.
